title: RENA Rebalancer Change Proposal
body:
The Rena rebalancer is not being called, despite having approximately $300k of liquidity within it. The reason it's not being called is that the reward to the caller does not cover the gas fee.

This can be fixed by upping the percentage of liquidity rebalanced, reward percentage to the caller, and the frequency of when it's available. We have also added some changes that we believe will help boost the effectiveness of RenaSwap.

Current Rebalance Percentages:
Once Per Hour

0.5% of liquidity is removed
It is then split into ETH and RENA
ETH market buys RENA
Send 15% RENA to RENA/rITS pair on RenaSwap
Send 40% RENA to RENA/rETH pair on RenaSwap
Send 2.5% to the caller
Send 2.5% to Treasury
Burn 40%

New Proposed Rebalance Percentages
Once Per 12 hours

3% of liquidity is removed (+2.5%)
It is then split into ETH and RENA
ETH market buys RENA
Send 15% RENA to RENA/rITS pair on RenaSwap (-0%)
Send 60% RENA to RENA/rETH pair on RenaSwap (+25%)
Send 7.5% to the caller (+5%)
Send 7.5% to Treasury (+5%)
Burn 10% (-30%)
author: 0x1dac25A83C1daeC849852f03887d22610df279a9
